short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On this extension you will get almost all kinds of cool symbols that can be used in social media platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collection of cool computer text symbols and signs that you can use on social media network. Please scroll the extension to see all different cool symbols. And just click on an icon to copy it to the clipboard & insert it to a device input element. All your lovely choices is already collected here to copy and paste cool symbols, which is useful, and handy interface.
Help us to improve our product and leave your comment or feedback. Install, enjoy & don't forget to share with your friends and family.
